fields.name: ContainerStorageInterface
fields.description: Container Storage Interface information for the AML file system.

fields.name: LustreVersion
fields.description: The version of Lustre running in the AML file system

fields.name: MgsAddress
fields.description: The IPv4 address used by clients to mount the AML file system's Lustre Management Service (MGS).

fields.name: MountCommand
fields.description: Recommended command to mount the AML file system
